text: Leslie Dunlop Campbell Jr. (born January 26, 1925) is an American lawyer and politician who served as a member of the Virginia state senate. The former commonwealth's attorney of Hanover County, he won the nomination for Senate in 1963 against former delegate Edmund T. DeJarnette. He was defeated in a 1975 Democratic primary challenge by Elmo Cross. == References == == External links == * Category:1925 births Category:Living people Category:Virginia Democrats Category:Virginia state senators Category:20th-century American politicians
title: Leslie D. Campbell Jr.
